effect.shortEffect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.
effect.full: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.

description.diamond-pearl: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
description.platinum: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
description.black-white: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
description.black-2-white-2: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
description.x-y: Makes the Pokémon use a held Berry earlier than usual.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Makes the Pokémon use a held Berry earlier than usual.
description.sun-moon: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.
description.sword-shield: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.
